trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SEQ_00<tab>Having given you due warning, Zero would leave you to your own devices.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Zero and have her accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_01<tab>Gather information while Zero is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_02<tab>Accompany Zero to the designated location and then speak with her.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_03<tab>Accompany Zero to the designated location and then speak with her again.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_04<tab>Search for Farfarello while Zero is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Ciriatto while Zero is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Ciriatto again while Zero is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Ciriatto yet again while Zero is accompanying you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Estinien.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_001<tab>'Tis said that a person's domain is a reflection of what abides in their heart. If true, this place may offer a glimpse into Zero's past.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_005<tab>The longer one lives, the more one yearns for peace. I understand why some would sequester themselves here.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_010<tab>'Tis quite a gathering of voidsent. I pray one among them has the knowledge we seek.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_020<tab>Consider yourselves duly warned. If you wish to go among the voidsent here, that is your choice to make.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_020<tab>All have fled from one master or another. But whether any of those masters in turn served Golbez, I do not know. You must ask them yourselves.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_110_020<tab>Most have traveled to your world, so it shouldn't be difficult to communicate.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_022<tab>We shall go about making inquiries at once. Thank you for your counsel.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_100_022<tab>Once we've learned all we can, let us reconvene at yonder plaza.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_028<tab>You're going too, of course? In which case, I shall accompany you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_029<tab>I wish only to observe. Do not expect me to help.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_030<tab>Then it's settled. I'm ready when you are.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_100<tab>As you may recall, when a larger voidsent is summoned, only its soul makes the journey to the Source.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_105<tab>Upon its arrival, it takes possession of a host body. But during that time, what becomes of its actual body here in the Thirteenth?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_110<tab>The answer to this question may give us valuable insight into cross-rift travel.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_115<tab>To that end, while asking after Golbez, I shall also see what the voidsent can tell me about their experiences when summoned.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_120<tab>If a voidsent is too weak to create its own domain, it must join with others for protection.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_125<tab>Alternately, it might devour them in a bid to become stronger, but in so doing risk losing its sense of self.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_130<tab>'Tis an unenviable struggle...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_135<tab>'Twas in order to strike down the Cloud of Darkness that my sister crossed over into the void.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_140<tab>What befell her after she vanished into the gate? How did she become Golbez's captive? These things and more, I hope to learn...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_150<tab>Ready? Then lead the way. I leave it to you to decide with whom you speak.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_151<tab>Zero is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_152<tab>You can leave Zero behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_153<tab>If you wish to have Zero accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_200<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_201<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>Part ways with Zero.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_207<tab>Although this is my domain, I don't make a habit of strolling about. 'Tis a strange feeling...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_214<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Zero?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_215<tab>You have other business? Fine. Come and find me at my abode when you've finished.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_216<tab>Finished tending to your other affairs? Then let us continue on.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_204<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about Zero's abode.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_205<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about the plaza.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_208<tab>I call this my abode, but spend hardly any time here. I return only for meditation.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_209<tab>While physical wounds can be healed by replenishing one's aether, you can't preserve your form if you lose sight of yourself.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_210<tab>Such is the risk inherent in consuming another's soul. It dilutes your sense of self. Alters you inside and out.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_210<tab>To guard against this, I meditate. Visualize who I am, in a place all my own.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_211<tab>This is the heart of my domain. Normally it's deserted, but you and yours have drawn everyone out.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_212<tab>I don't recall this statue, though...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_213<tab>However it came to be here, I certainly didn't wish for it.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_217<tab>I thought you were her prey, but they say you're her minions. Which are you?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_218<tab>Are you really a mortal? I've never seen a mortal before...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_219<tab><slurp> I bet you taste good. But I can't eat you, else I'll be eaten too...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_220<tab>You must be accompanied by Zero and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_221<tab>Zero has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_222<tab>To walk around with her like that... You're her minion, then?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_223<tab>You know I don't take minions. <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> has some questions, and I want you to answer them.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_224<tab>Golbez? I don't know that one. Only Scathach.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_225<tab>When she led us beyond the veil, I grew scared and fled.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_226<tab>I've been here since. I don't know anyone else, nor do I wish to. That's all I can tell you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_227<tab>Scathach was a powerful voidsent who ruled over a vast domain. That was a long time ago, though, so I doubt she has any connection to Golbez.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596A_000_230<tab>I told you─I don't know anyone else, nor do I wish to. Leave me be.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_240<tab>You're one of the mortals! Is it true? When you die over there, you <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> die?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_241<tab>So it is, so it is! What brings you here, then?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_242<tab>Ah yes, Golbez. He seeks strong minions to grow his army, so I hear.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_243<tab>But recently, he stopped doing that. Instead, he devours all.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_244<tab>Perhaps he's gathered enough fodder and is now intent on bolstering his own strength. A sure sign that he is about to make a move.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596B_000_245<tab>By the way, why haven't you died already? Over there, you can do so any time, no? Don't miss your chance, or you'll end up like us.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_250<tab><rumble> Stay away from me... If you don't want to be eaten, stay away...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_251<tab>Golbez, Golbez... I've heard the name before.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_252<tab>Ah, I remember! Always speaking of a great crusade. I don't know what that is, but it sounds delicious. <slurp>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_253<tab>A crusade, you say? From whom did you hear this?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_254<tab>Farfarello. He was a minion of another minion. Went on and on about the terrible things he saw.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_255<tab>I see... Perhaps Farfarello can tell us more.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VOIDSENT04596C_000_260<tab>Why do you want to know about Golbez? Do you have a crusade too?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_270<tab>Satisfied with what you've learned? Ah─but let's step away before you become too tempting to resist.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_300<tab>It seems the rumors of Golbez reach even my remote domain.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_301<tab>Fair to assume he's gathering strength for his crusade─whatever that may be.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_302<tab>But I must say, I wouldn't have guessed that Farfarello once fought in Golbez's army. It's a miracle he survived serving an archfiend.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_303<tab>Ah, I suppose I should explain.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_304<tab>Farfarello is the weakest among us. Constantly in fear of being devoured, he seldom consorts with others.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_305<tab>The only one he's comfortable with is Ciriatto.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_306<tab>He's a fellow coward who runs the instant he senses a threat, and won't stop until he's exhausted.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_307<tab>When their hunger grows too intense, they feed on each other's aether. Such is their relationship.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_308<tab>But I ramble. You intend to seek out Farfarello, I presume?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_309<tab>Then I'll come with you. He's less likely to hide that way.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_400<tab>Farfarello keeps to the fringes of my domain. This way.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_SYSTEM_000_206<tab><var 48 F20224 /var>Ask about Farfarello's hiding place.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_500<tab>The voidsent here don't answer to a master. They can do as they please.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_501<tab>But all must answer to the hunger, and seek out prey when they need aether.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_502<tab>Except Farfarello and Ciriatto, that is─they are content to take from one another. Barring an incident, they dare not venture out.

TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_503<tab>When he takes flight, Ciriatto will not seek shelter until he is utterly spent. Farfarello, on the other hand, prefers to hide in the same place. Come.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_504<tab>Uwaaaaaah! P-Please don't eat me...but I suppose you have to...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_505<tab>Oh, whatever will I do now? <whimper>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_506<tab>Ciriatto... This is rather unexpected. Where is Farfarello?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_507<tab><gulp>
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_508<tab>Farfarello...isn't here anymore. He's...left. Y-Yes, that's right!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_509<tab>Left? That doesn't sound like him at all.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_510<tab>W-Well, he's gone, all right? Wh-What more do you want me to say?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_511<tab>And off he flees, as he is wont to do.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_512<tab>But something about this doesn't sit well with me...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_513<tab>What do you make of Ciriatto's behavior?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_A1_000_001<tab>He seemed frightened. Perhaps someone had threatened him?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_A1_000_002<tab>I don't think he was telling the truth.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_515<tab>I doubt it. Had he been threatened, we wouldn't have found him in one place.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_516<tab>No, he would run in circles until he could run no more. That's his nature.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_517<tab>So you think so too.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_519<tab>As he says, Farfarello is gone. But that is quite unusual.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_520<tab>As is the fact that Ciriatto, who was clearly frightened by something, chose not to flee but instead hid here, where Farfarello usually─
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_520<tab>...No.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_521<tab>We must go after Ciriatto. Now.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_530<tab>I know Farfarello was our quarry, but Ciriatto's behavior troubles me. We must find him.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_600<tab>I-I don't have time for this... You'd best keep your distance if you know what's good for you!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_601<tab>Ciriatto, we need to talk.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_602<tab>Th-There's no time! The wind rises! We must flee!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_603<tab>The wind rises...? What is he talking about?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_604<tab>After him.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_700<tab>Uwaaah, the wind howls! Louder and louder!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_701<tab>What's gotten into you? What do you mean, the wind rises?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_702<tab>When the wind rises, she comes! <var 1A 02 /var>Barbariccia<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_703<tab>Barba...riccia? Who in the world is that?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_704<tab>We must flee, all of us! There's no time!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_705<tab>I don't sense anything, but he seems convinced.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_706<tab>It's a dead end beyond. We'll corner him.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_800<tab>Ahhh, it's too late! The wind is already upon us!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_801<tab>We're doomed! There's nowhere to run!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_802<tab>What are you running from?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_803<tab>I-I already told you! Barbariccia, the archfiend of wind!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_804<tab>Archfiend, you say?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_805<tab>We will be devoured or forced to serve. To fight in the crusade. But it makes no difference. In the end, all are eaten by her or her enemies.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_806<tab>I didn't want to fight anymore. That's why I fled and came here!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_807<tab>I see. That explains everything...almost.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_808<tab>I thought it was Farfarello who used to serve an archfiend. Not you.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_808<tab>Not you, who always ran at the first sign of trouble. You who now speak as though you were Barbariccia's minion. There's only one explanation...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_A2_000_001<tab>He devoured Farfarello...didn't he?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_200_808<tab>Indeed, that would account for his uncharacteristic behavior.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_811<tab>So, is that the way of it? Did you devour Farfarello?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_812<tab>And not just a portion of his aether, but his entire being.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_813<tab>Tell me true, Ciriatto. You devoured Farfarello, didn't you?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_814<tab>And not just a portion of his aether, but his entire being.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_816<tab>...H-How did you know?
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_817<tab>It wasn't only your behavior that felt strange.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_818<tab><var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> felt strange. As if there was more than you present.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_818<tab>Now, I don't believe you would've lost control. More likely it was at Farfarello's behest.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_819<tab>I can't hide anything from you...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_100_819<tab>I admit it. Farfarello didn't leave. I ate him.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_820<tab>He feared Barbariccia more than anything. Hated the endless fighting.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_821<tab>So he begged me to devour him, that he would never have to fight again.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_821<tab>Rather than an eternity of fighting, he chose a moment of pain...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_200_821<tab>For all the good it did. I can still hear his voice in my head. He's frightened, so very frightened...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_822<tab>When you're eaten, your essence is blended with that of your devourer. And though you have no control, your consciousness in part endures.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_100_822<tab>Were this a world where the wheel of life and death still turned, the soul wouldn't linger so stubbornly.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_110_822<tab>In time, it would return to the great flow.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_120_822<tab>But there's no such end here. No escape. All know this. In making his choice, Farfarello must have been desperate indeed.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_823<tab>And now that desperation has joined with Ciriatto's fear, driving him to act erratically.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_824<tab>This place will become a battlefield. We don't want to be eaten. Neither me nor Farfarello. But there's nowhere to go! Nowhere!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_825<tab>Then tell me about Barbariccia. I would know who it is we face.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_FORMERMINIONVOIDSENT_000_826<tab>It's too late. She's as good as here, and no one can escape her winds! No one!
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_YSHTOLA_000_900<tab>What little I learned in your absence did not pertain to the archfiends. That discussion can wait until after we've tended to Barbariccia.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_905<tab>Just you wait, Barbariccia. I will have answers from you yet...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_910<tab>I have no intention of demanding anyone's aether until afterwards. Weakening you now would only reduce my chances of getting paid.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_920<tab>The less time we give the enemy to prepare, the better. If everyone is ready, then let us set forth.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_000_921<tab>Indeed. And yet...my heart weighs heavy for those Barbariccia struck down. Were it not for us, she would not have come here.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_VARSHAHN_100_921<tab>Should you require a moment, Zero...
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_MYSTERIOUSPERSON_000_922<tab>For what? Barbariccia took what she could. She was wise to strike quickly─as we would be.
TEXT_AKTKMI105_04596_ESTINIEN_000_924<tab>Agreed. This is no time for sentiment. Only the battle matters now.
